class_notes: (HYBRID OR ONLINE; online synchronous live sessions 9:00am-11:00am weekdays January 4-15; online synchronous live small groups one hour each weekday scheduled separately within these dates; on-campus or online (student option, conditions permitting) final preaching even, January 19 and 20 9:00am-10:30am; remaining contact time fulfilled via asynchronous online engagement)
course_description: Practice and study of factors that increase the interest of a sermon as it is preached. The class emphasizes word as sound and sensitivity of the preacher to the involvement of the body and feelings in sermon delivery.

MTWThF 9am-10:30am in Cannon Chapel Sanctuary
